title: Make Data
description: Bring your creations to life with real data: sports scores, weather, images and more.

steps.hint: We're going to build a weather app. Choose your location with `location = "Palo Alto"`
To pull in the weather, we are going to use the 'get' command. **Type** `weather = get "weather", location`
And lets get a background image using the same command, but this time getting an image. **Type** `background get "image", location`
Next, set the font to 110 to make your city location nice and big.

completion_text: Awesome app! Change the location to wherever you want!
